item.title: OSS developer
item.description: Beyond coding Podcasting As host Currently working on launching a podcast about cloud native technology and concepts. Will be out second half of 2019, stay tuned. I co-hosted the Go Time podcast show alongside the wonderful human beings Erik St. Martin and Brian Ketelsen from 2016 until 2018 (episodes 1 to 79). As guest Virtually Speaking Podcast - Velero PodCTL Podcast - Understanding Project Velero (formerly Ark) Getup Cloud Podcast - (Portuguese) KubeCon Day 3 — A Importância de Contribuir
